entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow or rain showers beginning near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain showers changing to periods of rain or drizzle this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
